title: Middle East Crisis: C.I.A. Chief Joins Cairo Talks in Push for Cease-Fire Deal
content: Mediators plan to move ahead with a summit next week in pursuit of a cease-fire agreement, officials said. “The process is moving forward,” a White House national security spokesman told reporters.

title: Families of Dead Hostages Vent Anger at Israeli Leaders Over War
